law.catch_line: Superintendent to hold a mine foreman certificate.
law.text: Mine superintendents shall hold a mine foreman certificate issued by the commissioner.
law.history: Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 104, sec. 9, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 308, sec. 10, effective April 9, 1996. -- Created 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 8, sec. 8.

metadata.lrc-note: (4/9/96). The action taken with respect to this statute by 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 308 was to have become effective April 8, 1996, under Section 51 of that Act. The Act, however, did not become effective until April 9, 1996, when the Governor's signed copy of the Act was filed with the Secretary of State.
